titles.title: A bill to make improvements to the conduct of United States foreign policy through a change in the supervision of the Peace Corps and transferring it from the status of "independent agency" to a subordinate agency within the Department of State, and for other purposes.
Peace Corps Mission Accountability Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
